## 5-Day Mathematics Study Plan

You’re taking a great step by dedicating time to study math! Stay consistent and curious, and you’ll see progress every day.

| Day   | Focus Area                       | Activities                                      |
|-------|---------------------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| Day 1 | Number Basics                   | Review whole numbers, integers, and fractions. Practice simple operations. |
| Day 2 | Algebra Fundamentals            | Learn about variables, expressions, and simple equations. Solve basic problems. |
| Day 3 | Geometry Basics                | Study shapes, angles, and perimeter. Draw and calculate simple figures. |
| Day 4 | Data and Probability            | Understand data representation (charts, tables). Learn basic probability concepts. |
| Day 5 | Review and Practice             | Solve mixed problems from Days 1-4. Identify weak spots and revisit them. |

### Suggested Free Resources
- **Khan Academy (Math Basics)**: Offers free, low-bandwidth-friendly lessons on all topics above. [khanacademy.org](https://www.khanacademy.org)
- **Math is Fun**: Simple explanations and interactive examples on many math topics. [mathsisfun.com](https://www.mathsisfun.com)
- **CK-12 Foundation**: Free downloadable PDFs and lessons for math practice. [ck12.org](https://www.ck12.org/student/)

Keep your study time focused, and remember to take short breaks to stay fresh!
